title: Weight pocket left with moveable d-ring - Tecline

photos.alt: Kiesze≈Ñ balastowa z ruchomym d-ringiem, lewa - Tecline

description:
Product description

WEIGHT POCKET LEFT, STANDARD

 

DESCRIPTION:

- Left weight pocket with a buckle and movable d-ring

- To be fixed on a backplate with the included screws

- The pocket holds up to  3-4kg of weights (depending on the shape of weights)

 

NOTE!

THE POCKET IS DELIVERED WITH A SHORT SCREW:

Please use the included short screw to install the pocket to the backplate. If you need to install the pocket and, another piece of accessory (e.g. backplate softpad)

please use a long screw (T01103). To be purchased separately.
